name: Severed Steel: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Severed Steel Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full game, official soundtrack & digital art book. Soundtrack: Features 59 tracks, including 15 previously unreleased bonus songs. Artbook: Full of concept sketches, storyboards, in-game imagery & more.

name: Gamedec: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
This bundle includes:
Gamedec digital copy
The Art of Gamedec – 80 pages of art and design concepts.
Digital Soundtrack - many minutes of the noir-themed original score.
Exclusive skin of Torkil Aymore - the protagonists known from the Gamedec books saga.

name: Music Quiz Party
description:
Let's play the battle game of music trivia quiz with tunes on your iPhone!
Players answer a variety of questions, such as music intro quiz
and trivia quiz asked for the name of albums or artists.
For example,
"Which of the following is NOT included on this album?"
"How many songs does this album contain?".
You can choose 2 to 4 player battle mode and 1 player mode.
You can limit the questions to songs by selected artists, albums or playlists.
Enjoy it with friends liking same kinds of music!

name: Metroid: Deep Freeze
description: Deep Freeze is a small Zero Mission hack with new environments, item progression, and more.

name: Alex Kidd in Radaxian Rumble
description: This is a hack of Alex Kidd in Miracle World made using KiddEd, aiming to provide new challenges for fans of the original, give the game a bit of an audiovisual update, as well as make parts of the original game flow a bit better. Most levels build on the ones in the original game, but there are some completely new ones as well.

name: Euro Fishing: Collector's Edition
description: Welcome to the Great Indoors!

name: Kena: Bridge of Spirits - Deluxe Edition
description:
Kena: Bridge of Spirits is a 2021 action-adventure video game developed and published by Ember Lab. The story follows Kena, a young spirit guide who uses her magical abilities to help deceased people move from the physical to the spirit world. The game is presented through a third-person perspective. The player uses Kena's staff for attacking enemies, and her pulse ability for defending against attacks. They are tasked with collecting small spirit companions known as the Rot, who help to complete tasks and battle against enemies.

The Deluxe Edition includes a copy of the Base Game, Official Digital Soundtrack, Unique Kena Staff, Golden Rot Skin, Retail Exclusive Sticker Sheet, and Unique Celebration Hats for Rots.

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Regalla Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Horizon Forbidden West (Digital) PS4 and PS5 versions
- Horizon Forbidden West SteelBook Display Case
- Download code for the game will be supplied via voucher in the box.
- A Regalla-themed, custom sculpted Tremortusk and Aloy statue
- Statues will require some assembly; detailed instructions will be provided with the box!
- Replica Focus and custom stand
- 2 Art Print Cards
- Replica Sunwing and Clawstrider Machine Physical Strike Pieces
- Mini Art Book
- Canvas Map
- 2 Special Outfits (Carja Behemoth Elite and Nora Thunder Elite)
- 2 Special Weapons (Carja Behemoth Short Bow and Nora Thunder Sling)
- In-game Resources Pack including ammunition, potions, and travel packs
- In-game Apex Clawstrider Machine Strike Piece
- Exclusive Photo Mode poses and face paints
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Version of The Sunhawk, the first Horizon Zero Dawn graphic novel

name: Headmaster: Extra Time Edition
description: You are a professional soccer player, but not a good one.

name: Crown Trick: Limited Edition
description: Crown Trick features unique synchronous turn-based combat so that enemies and deadly traps only react when the player does. As Elle, a combination of skills, magical Familiar skills, weapons, and strategic thinking is required to escape the labyrinthian procedural dungeons of the Nightmare Realm alive.

name: Alex Kidd: Fall of Radaxian
description: Sin descripción

name: NHL 17: Deluxe Edition
description: All-new game modes, new and deeper experiences in fan-favorite modes, and the best on-ice gameplay ever make NHL 17 the most exciting EA SPORTS NHL game to date.

name: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen - Origins Edition
description: For the first time ever, the origins of the Utawarerumono saga are coming overseas! Prelude to the Fallen follows the story of a man with no memories who awakens in a strange world and is taken in by a tribe of kindhearted beast folk. He is raised as one of their own, eventually earning the name “Hakuoro.” When neighboring nations begin to encroach on his homeland, Hakuoro rises up against the tyrannical invaders, setting himself on an unforgettable journey that lives on in the songs of legend.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Bassmaster Fishing 2022 Digital Deluxe Edition includes everything from the Standard Edition of the game, plus a heap more additional content!

With 6 stunning deluxe edition boat wraps, 5 special Deluxe Edition clothing items, and a mix of Deluxe Edition exclusive rods, reels, and lures with exclusive designs, you’ll be the envy of all your competitors on the water.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Vincent Sin Edition
description: This edition includes the following Vincent's Socks, Game Discs with Case, World Compendium Detailing the Game's Setting and Lore, Postcards from Night City, Map of Night City, Stickers, Game Soundtrack (Download), Art booklet featuring a selection of art from the game (Download), Cyberpunk 2020 sourcebook (Download), Wallpapers for desktop and mobile (Download), "GANGS OF CYBERPUNK" Woven Badges

name: Donkey Kong Land: New Colors Mode
description: This is a GameBoy to GameBoy Color conversion for Donkey Kong Land. It also includes some new features: A Time Attack mode, level names from the manual displayed in the corner of the screen on the overworld, unused music restored, and quality of life updates: an icon now appears in the bottom right of the screen when you have a Kong in reserve, and you can change your Kong’s palette

name: The Card Battle: Eternal Destiny
description: The Card Battle: Eternal Destiny is an epic card game inspired by myths and legends, featuring 600+ cards with delightful animation! Build your own deck with various cards, and beat enemies with high-level strategy combining evolutions, abilities, and attributes.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces EX: Kawaii Cute Goddesses
description: "Jigsaw Masterpieces" series is a digital jigsaw puzzle game that is easy for anyone to play. Many convenient functions for completing the puzzle, such as the function to separate edge and inner pieces and the auto save function for playing lighthearted at any time. "Jigsaw Masterpieces EX - Kawaii Cute Goddesses -" contains a total of 120 images of 24 cute girls based on mythical goddesses. Each puzzle has three different numbers of pieces, so you can have a lot of fun. There are 70 pieces for everyone, 260 pieces for a bit of challenge, and 400 pieces for the professional level. Which game level do you want to play first? If it is a digital jigsaw puzzle... You don't have to worry about losing the pieces. You don't have to need prepare a large space to suspend the puzzle. Let's have fun playing the jigsaw puzzle with "Jigsaw Masterpieces"!

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Lotus Labyrinth R
description: Venture into dungeons with a huge party of your favorite Touhou characters! This is a dungeon-crawler RPG with an absurdly large party size! The dungeon-crawler RPG Genso Wanderer is now a game with an Oversized Party System that pushes the envelope of the roguelike genre! Now you can bring dozens of partners with you on your dungeon crawls, in addition to other quality of life improvements that make the game's systems and controls smoother than ever. Overwhelm your enemies with strength in numbers! Lead tons of your favorite Touhou characters at once and conquer the impregnable Lotus Labyrinth!

name: Wild & Horror Pinball
description:
Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds.
Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you.
Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard. Arcade design.
More than 8 missions to accomplish for game! Are you ready? Multiball, Extraball, Skillshot, Jackpots...

name: Diablo Prime Evil Collection
description:
The Diablo Prime Evil Collection includes:
- Diablo III: Eternal Collection game
- Diablo II: Resurrected game
- Diablo III: Hatred’s Grasp Wings DLC
- Diablo III: Mephisto Pet DLC

Diablo II: Resurrected is the definitive remastering of Diablo II and its Lord of Destruction expansion—two hallmark entries in Blizzard Entertainment’s genre-defining action role-playing series. Veteran players, as well as those who missed out when the original game was first released on PC twenty years ago, can now experience Diablo II’s timeless gameplay with modern visuals and audio that take advantage of today’s gaming hardware. Ascend the Forgotten Tower, blaze a trail through the jungles of Kurast, and storm the gates of Hell to defeat Diablo himself. Then, scale the peak of Mount Arreat to face Baal, the Lord of Destruction, in Worldstone Keep. Seven of Sanctuary’s greatest champions await at the iconic campfire screen—the Amazon, Assassin, Barbarian, Druid, Necromancer, Paladin, and Sorceress. Each is highly customizable with countless build and gear options for players to explore.

Diablo II: Resurrected can be played as a solo experience, or grab some friends on Nintendo Switch and enjoy multiplayer co-op. Then blow off some steam and claim a few ears by engaging in thrilling PvP duels outside of town. Find your way back to New Tristram in Diablo III: Eternal Collection, 20 years following the events in Diablo II: Resurrected. Return to where it all began and investigate rumors of a fallen star: the first sign of evil's rebirth, and an omen that the End Times have begun.…

name: Business Tour Deluxe
description: Business Tour is an online strategy game based on the most popular tabletop game in the world. Business Tour's simple and entertaining gameplay allows you to come up with many interesting strategies, come to agreements with your rivals and even enter into conspiracies against other players. Apart from that, the game helps you to reveal your inner entrepreneurial qualities. For precisely this reason, children and adults alike can enjoy this game equally.

name: Sophia's World
description: Classic platform gameplay meets brightly colored, timeless graphics and cute characters. Fun for the entire family: from the youngest kids to grandma and grandpa. In no time at all, everyone will be captivated by the concept and won't be able to stop playing until all the coins in the level have been found.

name: Arcade Archives: Typhoon Gal
description: Typhoon Gal is an action game released by Taito in 1985. Players control martial-arts challenger Yuki as she faces off with the toughest opponents at rival martial arts schools. Yuki can use both major and minor techniques. Weaken enemies with minor techniques, then take them down with a single major technique!

name: MMC Kenken: The World's Most Exciting Math and Logic Puzzle
description:
The hit teaching material that has sold over 2.5 million copies has been turned into game software as "Daizen"! A total of 3,000 math puzzles for children and adults to learn while having fun. There are two modes of play. One puzzle per day In this mode, you can challenge a scored puzzle only once a day. You can also get a certificate according to your total points for a month. You can also get a certificate depending on your total points for a month. Aim for a high score and keep challenging every day. Anytime Lesson In this mode, you can play puzzles at any time and for as long as you like.

There are five types of puzzles: "addition," "multiplication/subtraction," "multiplication," "multiplication/division," and "four rules. Keep challenging yourself with puzzles that gradually get more difficult. From elementary and junior high school students in compulsory education to adults who want to exercise their brains, please enjoy this math puzzle game that can be played over and over again!

name: Sports & Adventure Pinball
description: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately in the Nintendo eShop.

name: Arcade Archives: Soldam
description: Soldam is a puzzle game released by Jaleco in 1992. The game is an elusive puzzle known only to the fairy folk. The core rule of the game is to line up rows of nuts with the same color horizontally to remove them. The puzzle also has a special trick: surrounding other nuts with a pair of nuts of the same color will turn the nuts in the middle into the other color. Use this to make your way through the game!

name: Splatter
description: In the dark, where emptiness surrounds you, the only way to see something and find a way out is to spray as much paint as possible everywhere, but you should not rely on paint alone. Visual memory, abstract thinking, the ability to make decisions at lightning speed and, of course, strong nerves - these are the qualities that are needed to complete the game.

name: Ludo XXL
description: This classic game par excellence has brought young and old together for generations. The much-loved original, with its child-friendly rules and thrilling luck of the dice is now finally available for Nintendo Switch. It’s great fun for the whole family – full of both laughter and frustration!

name: Mountain Bike Hill Climb Race: Real 2D Arcade Dirt Racing Games
description: Mountain Bike Hill Climb Race is an exciting, 2D action Bicycle driving game based on real physics with funny cartoon graphics and parallax scrolling. Drive your mountain bike through paths and hurdles over beautifull hills and amazing mountains. It is a very addictive, simple 2D game, yet challenging to play. Use the left control stick to lean back or forward and the right control stick to speed up and slow down. Make stunts, run through jumps and flips, lean back on a rear wheel drive while browsing the 42 challenging levels available now. Go uphill or downhill on glaciers in the mountains and dangerous slopes with obstacles like tree trunks and rocks. Discover extreme sensations on a half pipe or pyramid in a snow resort to achieve the best time. The more you play, the better you become in handling the bicycle at high speed, but accelerate with caution as you may have a steep fall or sharp rising around the next corner. The challenge lies in landing savely on just two wheels and mastering the handling of your bicycle in order to become a 2D simulator stunts champ. So don't wait any longer, perform different cycling stunts, tricks and indulge yourself in this cycling excitement to get an adrenaline rush through the huge, beautifull mountains and hills!

name: Kyle is Famous: Complete Edition
description: Take Control of Kyle in this Text-Based Adventure. Make decisions for Kyle that will affect every part of his day. Take Kyle's hand through 117 unique endings, each determined by what Kyle has done and who he has interacted with. He needs you. Be kind. Kyle just woke up and Kyle needs to prepare to conduct an interview with a very, very important guest on his show. Collect items, make choices, and solve mysteries. Kyle can swallow the fridge and Kyle can travel time and steal from the locals and dump lard on his neighbor and many, many other things that KYLE SHOULD NOT DO. Take Kyle's hand. Direct him. Tell him what he ABSOLUTELY SHOULD NOT DO. Confidently help Kyle. He needs you. Kyle has 117 endings but only one of them is the good, well-prepared ending that you are going to guide Kyle to. Who knows what would happen if you weren't there for him? Would he destroy the city? Gossip about his neighbor? Fight crime? Revive a dead loved one?

name: Pool: 8 Ball Billiards
description: "Enjoy Hundreds of amazing pool challenges - test your skills, dexterity, and determination in an epic journey through several snooker tests. Become a master and beat 220+ exciting challenges. Try different types of billiards and choose which suits you best. Test yourself in a duel with Computer AI and show who rules here. Don’t worry if you aren’t pro yet. You have a chance to improve your skills in planned training mode after which the world of billiards will be open for you.

name: ExZeus: The Complete Collection
description: Hostile alien forces have set their sights on Earth and will stop at nothing to wipe our civilization from existence. The invaders seek to use their advanced technology to annihilate humanity, but they weren’t expecting the people of Earth to counter with sophisticated technology of our own. Enter Project ExZeus, humanity’s last and best defense to repel the otherworldly menace and restore peace to our little blue planet using ultra high tech fighting robots! Take control of four different robots and blast those aliens back to where they came from in these action-focused high-flying 3D arcade style rail shooters! ExZeus In the year 2102 C.E. a massive, previously unknown asteroid entered Earth’s orbit and began unleashing waves of attacks on the planet, killing thousands of people every day and devastating human civilization. The lucky few who survived the initial onslaught managed to escape deep underground, narrowly preventing humanity’s extinction. The Governing Council ordered an immediate counter-attack using three experimental robots: Calista, Sophia, and Dynamis. With that, Operation ExZeus was born. Now, you must choose one of the three giant flying robots to take into battle against the invading forces of Diadora. Soar through the skies, blast away enemies, and reclaim Earth for its people! ExZeus 2 After a century of peace, Operation ExZeus and the defeat of Diadora are but a distant memory for the people of Earth. However, the peace was not to last. A new menace has emerged from deep space in the form of five mysterious pods, each one a weapon of mass…

name: SGC: Short Games Collection #1
description:
Time is running short but you still want to play meaningful games that leave you with a sense of accomplishment. Well, look no further! The SGC - Short Games Collection has gathered five amazing gaming experiences that you can play through from start to finish and still have time to enjoy other fine things in life.

Encased in a beautiful 3D menu environment created originally for the SGC you will find: The Good Time Garden; Swallow the Sea; A Game Literally About Doing Your Taxes; Ghostein; and Uranus. These acclaimed gems are available on Nintendo Switch for the very first time. Experience the most psychedelic and thought provoking games anytime and anywhere.

name: Cape's Escape Game 4th Room
description: Cape's Escape Game 4th Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and escape from the Japanese hot springs inn.

name: Prepare the First RPG Village: The Adventures of Nyanzou&Kumakichi - Escape Game Series
description: We find ourselves in some RPG World. The Devil suddenly shows up. People fall into great misery. But, that’s when one young man makes a stand. He comes to be known as the Hero. He leaves the First Castle, heading for the First Village nearby. Leaving that aside for now, the First Village is very busy getting ready to welcome the Hero-sama. Looks like Nyanzou and Kumakichi, who live in the village, are also going to help out with the preparations. It's your standard escape game, on the easy side, and highly recommended for beginners. It comes with autosave, hints, and memo functions.

name: Math Classroom Challenge
description: Math is boring, so they say. Well, no more. Math Classroom Challenge is an educational game in first person view, with the mission of solving the different random mathematical exercises proposed. To do this, you have at your disposal a water hose, with which you must water the numbers and the appropriate solutions. All this in a safe environment to learn mathematics in a fun and enjoyable way. It's also the kids version of Math Combat Challenge. Math Classroom Challenge is designed for children over the age of four. In the game the player can do several activities: learn the numbers that fly, learn how to throw the water, solve the static panels looking for the corresponding numbers, and solve the dynamic panels that appear suddenly with three solutions. Always throwing the water from the hose to the correct solution. In Math Classroom Challenge there are two types of mathematical panels with hundreds of math combinations: static and dynamic. The static panels propose random exercises, of configurable difficulty, whose numbers have to be searched through the stage, and bathe them with the water of the hose that we carry. Dynamic panels appear anywhere, but can be repositioned, or even invoked manually, and contain three solutions. Irrigate with water the correct solution. Dragons, on the other hand, allow an error to be subtracted, although sometimes they will cause the opposite: they will add up to an error. So the player must decide whether to use them or not. The rocket, when it takes off, multiplies the points…

name: The Forgotten City: Cloud Version
description:
The Forgotten City - Cloud Version is a mystery adventure game of exploration and deduction, and a re-imagining of the critically acclaimed mod that won a national Writers' Guild award and racked up over 3 million downloads.
Combat is an option, but violence will only get you so far. Only by questioning an intertwined community of colourful characters, cleverly exploiting the time loop, and making difficult moral choices can you hope to solve this epic mystery. Here, your decisions matter. The fate of the city is in your hands.

name: Kirby's Dream Land DX
description: Just like Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening DX and Tetris DX, Dream Land DX is a port of the monochrome Gameboy game to the Gameboy Color.

name: Tekken 7: Lei Wulong
description: The super cop Lei Wulong has joined the fray! Keep your opponents guessing by switching seamlessly between his five stances as you dominate the battle!

name: Tekken 7: Kunimitsu
description: An add-on for TEKKEN 7 that grants use of the character "Kunimitsu".

name: Tekken 7: Island Paradise
description: An add-on for TEKKEN 7 that grants access to the "Island Paradise" stage.

name: Tekken 7: Eliza
description: Get the mysterious Eliza vampire playable character, coming from TEKKEN Revolution, and master her unique fighting style to win the fight against your friends and rivals.

name: Tekken 7: Craig Marduk
description: Craig Marduk, ferocious beast and Vale Tudo fighter, has joined the fray! Tower over your opponent before pummeling them with powerful techniques!

name: Super Mario Land DX
description: Super Mario Land DX is a romhack of the original Super Mario Land for the Game Boy that turns the game into a Game Boy Color game. It adds color and changes the graphics to give the game a modern look.

name: Tekken 7: Vermilion Gates
description: An add-on for TEKKEN 7 that grants access to the "Vermilion Gates" stage.

name: Tekken 7: Ganryu
description: An add-on for TEKKEN 7 that grants use of the character "Ganryu."

name: Super Mario Land 2 DX
description: Super Mario Land 2 DX is a color hack for Super Mario Land 2 in the same vein as Link’s Awakening DX. It adds color, lets you play with Luigi (with different physics) and removes the lag.

name: Metroid II DX
description: Metroid II DX is a mod that converts Metroid II to the Game Boy Color, now colorized. Not to be confused to the official Metroid II: Return of Samus DX, which was never released.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr Complete Collection
description:
The Complete Collection includes Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr and all additional content.

You are an Inquisitor, the Imperium's most powerful agent. Ensure the Emperor's will is respected in the far-flung corners of the dark universe of Warhammer 40,000 and uncover the secrets of the fortress-monastery, Martyr.
In this action-RPG, choose from amongst several character classes and take part in tactical and violent combat, in solo or co-op mode.

name: The Survivalists: Deluxe Edition
description: A living world full of surprises, secrets and danger awaits in The Survivalists, an adventure-filled survival sandbox set in The Escapists universe. Explore, build, craft and even train monkeys with up to three friends in a desperate bid to survive. Be prepared for your trek into the unknown and pack The Survivalists Deluxe Edition for the journey ahead.

name: G.I. Joe: Operation Blackout - Digital Deluxe
description:
G.I. Joe and Cobra are back! G.I. Joe: Operation Blackout is a team-based third- person shooter where you play as your favorite characters from Team G.I. Joe and Team Cobra. Experience the action from both sides as you help G.I. Joe restore order and lead Cobra to world domination. Continue the fight with all new character and weapon skins and get exclusive access to the art and music from the game!

Digital Deluxe Edition Includes:

Classic Duke & Classic Cobra Commander Character Pack - Two new characters skins based on the iconic 80's TV show!

Battle Gear: G.I. Joe and Cobra Weapons Pack - Includes 12 new weapon skins in Cobra Gold and G.I. Joe Chrome.

Exclusive Digital Art Book - Get a look at the never-before-seen art used to create the game.

Digital Soundtrack - Full length music tracks from game plus bonus tracks from the 80's TV show.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts & Sniper: Ghost Warrior 3: Unlimited Edition
description: The Sniper Ghost Warrior series has gained recognition among players for its uncompromising approach to being a sniper. Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts & SGW3 Unlimited Edition is an equally uncompromising offer for those who want to take what's best from the last two parts of the series! With Unlimited Edition you will receive the base two games: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts and Sniper Ghost Warrior 3 and a lots of DLCs that include a dozen hours of single-player missions, additional weapons and weapon skins, the game's soundtracks and all other previously released bonuses.

name: Planet Coaster: Deluxe Rides Collection
description:
Give your guests thrilling new experiences and let your imagination soar with the Deluxe Rides Collection. Combining everything from the celebrated Magnificent Rides Collection and Classic Rides Collection, this stacked assortment brings the fun and flair with 18 incredible attractions.

Expand your empire and reach the peak of coaster park entertainment with the Deluxe Rides Collection.

name: Minion Masters + Mordar's Malediction DLC
description: Bundle of Minion Masters and the Mordar's Malediction DLC for Xbox.

name: Lost Judgment: Digital Ultimate Edition
description:
Lost Judgment is an action-adventure video game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. A sequel to the 2018 game Judgment (a spin-off of the Like a Dragon series), the game focuses on private detective Takayuki Yagami as he investigates a criminal accused of both sexual harassment and murder

Joined by his partner, ex-yakuza Masaharu Kaito, the crime-fighting duo is called on to investigate a seemingly perfect crime whose lead suspect has an airtight alibi. What starts as a tale of revenge reveals a tangled web of conspiracy involving several unlikely factions taking advantage of a broken law system. But as victims pile up and Yagami unravels the truth, he must choose between defending the law or exacting justice.

The Digital Ultimate Edition includes the following in-game content:

-Lost Judgment base game
-Detective Essentials Pack
-School Stories Expansion Pack
-Character Story Expansion

name: Lost Judgment: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Lost Judgment is an action-adventure video game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. A sequel to the 2018 game Judgment (a spin-off of the Like a Dragon series), the game focuses on private detective Takayuki Yagami as he investigates a criminal accused of both sexual harassment and murder

Joined by his partner, ex-yakuza Masaharu Kaito, the crime-fighting duo is called on to investigate a seemingly perfect crime whose lead suspect has an airtight alibi. What starts as a tale of revenge reveals a tangled web of conspiracy involving several unlikely factions taking advantage of a broken law system. But as victims pile up and Yagami unravels the truth, he must choose between defending the law or exacting justice.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following in-game content:

-Lost Judgment base game
-Detective Essentials Pack
-School Stories Expansion Pack

name: Little Christmas Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Alder's Blood: Definitive Edition
description: Alder's Blood is a tactical strategy game with stealth-based combat, RPG elements, crafting, resources gathering, and management, exploration, and a rich storyline. Set in a grim world, where mankind killed their God and is facing extinction.

name: Summer Sports Games: 4K Edition
description: Prove your athletic skills and challenge your friends in twelve exciting disciplines!

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - JumpShip Edition
description: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries JumpShip Edition includes MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries with the year one update and the New Legendary update featuring Melee and Mech Switching, the first DLC Heroes of the Inner Sphere, and The Legend of the Kestrel Lancers Expansion.

name: AlphaLink
description: AlphaLink is a new multiplayer shooter based off the Kova sci-fi back story. Compete in local or online PVP matches, talk to NPCs in the hub about lore and upcoming events, customize your character, and take part in the global faction leaderboard! AlphaLink will continuously live with new updates giving fresh new features!

name: Ride 4: Special Edition
description:
RIDE 4 leverages Smart Delivery allowing access to both the Xbox One title and Xbox Series X|S title when available.

Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get?
RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.

name: Outer Wilds: Archaeologist Edition
description: Outer Wilds: Archaeologist Edition contains Outer Wilds base game and Echoes of the Eye expansion.

name: Viva Games Collection
description:
Two great games from Viva Games in one pack!

Immortal Legacy: The Jade Cipher: Delve deep into the origins of a sinister Chinese legend and unearth the secrets of an island's forgotten past in this pulse-pounding adventure.

Your Toy: Do you rememver your childhood toy? Where are they? They were your friend, ever, but can you imagine how they will be your nightmare for now? A popular 3D first person puzzle adventure game is now on sale!

name: Halloween Stories: Horror Movie - Collector's Edition
description: It’s Only a Movie... Right?

name: Sword Princess Amaltea: The Visual Novel
description: Princess Amaltea is sent out on this quest, and rescues Prince Ossian. They are both unwilling to play along in these traditional expectations of them, and after fleeing their own wedding they are now out on the open roads – on to new adventures in this gender flipped world!

name: Dreams of Adventure
description: Dreams Of Adventure brings you in a world of medival fantasy where you chose how to play and impact the world around you. Will you help a person in need? Want them to pay you for help? Perhaps... you end their life and take the bellongings...? The choice is yours!

name: Norr part II: Will Walker
description: Shot, run and slow time or you'll die!

name: Curving Over It with Evgeny Podoynikov
description: Overcome obstacles by throwing a ball, which is not as simple as it might seem.

name: Forbidden place
description: A zombie virus appeared in the spacecraft. Please collect the materials in the spacecraft and try to escape.

name: Legends of Murder Collection
description: When a murder is committed under mysterious and supernatural circumstances, the Inspector arrives on the scene, ready to interrogate witnesses, decipher riddles, and fend off attackers seeking their next victim. Ready your spyglass and sword as you take on these two murder mystery RPGs.

name: Runout
description: The RunOut is a dynamic runner-platformer with logical puzzles. The main setting is the future. The game difficulty is between midcore and hardcore.

name: Hellworld!
description: A story-driven 2D platforming game in which you possess your enemies and use their abilities to solve puzzles and make your way through the land of Hellworld.

name: Abh
description: This is a psychological thriller game set in the 1990's, you wake up in a strange house and must search the house for a way out, if that is how your story will end. There will be some jumpscares.

name: Trazz
description: Welcome to Trazz! This is a casual, chill-out arcade game inspired by old popular brick breaker games like Arkanoid or Breakout. Lots of levels, weird power ups and upgrades.

name: Match It!
description: Simple but fun... how fast can you clear the dome of blocks! Built for VR-only, and it's a great game for people who don't like a lot of motion. Requires two controllers.

name: Scp: Breakout
description: In SCP: Breakout, spawn as a lowly D-Class that has been granted their one chance to escape, team up with other players or go it alone as you take on the facility at its worst. In the midst of a catastrophic breach, will you survive?

name: Daikaiju Daikessen: Versus
description: Daikaiju Daikessen: Versus is a free to play arcade-style brawler inspired by the likes of classic Neo Geo’s King of the Monsters. The game will be regularly updated with new characters from various indie creators, along with new stages and game modes.

name: Incarnata: Dormant Stories
description: Incredible depth, within an infinite world. Dive into this adventure simulation and become everything you decide to be. The game adapts and builds challenges, creates unique characters, places, and goals for you to weave your own story.

name: Adventures of Megara: Antigone and the Living Toys
description: Help Megara find Antigone and reveal the living toys’ secret

name: Jelly Brawl: Classic
description: Jelly Brawl: Classic is a physics based party game where you gotta flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends and experience the mayhem of the Classic mode as you struggle to be the last jelly standing!

name: Capture the Flag 1
description: A casual, family friendly capture the flag multiplayer game that brings nostalgia to anyone who played the team based game as a child. Who would've thought that back-to-back juking and defensive play would be so fun! Add to your Wishlist now & be ready for some satisfyingly amusing 5v5 action!

name: Disposable heroes 2 : The curse that killed a queen
description: 4 new heroes are needed when when an evil sorceress queen and her army of soldiers spread fear and destruction across the lands

name: Future Fortune
description: Future Fortune is an incremental/idle game featuring big numbers, a multi-layer prestige system, a milestone reward system, multiple upgrade shops, and much more!

name: Gga
description: 《GGA》是一款MOBA类电子竞技俱乐部模拟经营游戏，目标是带领战队夺得冠军！

name: Castle Siege
description: An asymmetric 1v1 tower defense/offense multiplayer game set in a fantasy medieval setting. Attack or defend the castle. Level up, and use magical spell cards to gain an advantage.

name: March! March!
description: March! March! is a turn-based duel game with a puzzle-based combat system. Each turn your army gets a regiment that varies in formation and size. You only have a few seconds to decide where your soldiers fit best. Tell your units where to march! march! and they will do the rest.

name: BeachHead 2020
description: BEACHHEAD 2020 - IT'S NOT JUST A GAME, IT'S THE FUTURE OF REALITY. 20 years ago, BEACH HEAD 2000 changed the gaming paradigm by bringing a new gaming experience to life. 20 years later, the original game creators are ready to do it again. WELCOME TO BH2020 AND A NEW DIMENSION IN GAMING.

name: Apostle: Rebellion
description: A sci-fi, turn-based RPG. Humanity has reached a point where the majority of people opt to become cyborgs called Roids. However, social inequality is once again at a breaking point.

name: Attack of the Mechadonk: The Ultimate Donkey
description: Old school side scrolling shoot'em up. Blast through exciting different locations. Defeating waves of defenders until the final boss battle. Attack of the Mechadonk is a indie game developed for fun and learning for the creator.

name: Lovely Animal Stories
description: Lovely Animal Stories is a short game about cute animals. You have to complete 30 levels with simple tasks. Duration of the game: 20-30 minutes.

name: Retro Three Kingdoms
description: A game of oriental history made by a European War and war and war... Your time is precious.

name: Coloring Pixel: Fantasy Characters
description: Coloring Pixel - Fantasy Characters is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Coloring Pixel has never been this easy!

name: Lucky Tlhalerwa's Cybernetic Titan
description: First-Person Round Survival Shooter, Take Control Of IMS Sergeant John Kozack Working With Corporal Sebastian McGregor To Survive Attacks Of The Global Terrorism Confederation, Use Modern Day & WW2 Guns, Bombs, Attachments, Call In Controllable Support Aircrafts And Survive All Rounds To Evacuate.

name: Ningakki XXVI FPS
description: A first person shooter set in a dark future filled with death robots. The goal is to survive by killing all of the robots. This game is based on the FPS Microgame tutorial project from Unity, and is a work in progress.

name: Unity Invaders
description: Space Action,Casual game,Arcade

name: Virtual Hunter
description: Prepare for a hunting experience of a lifetime. Virtual Hunter brings realistic hunting to virtual reality. Pack your gear and put your hunting skills and tactics to the test in the open wilderness.

name: AsMagnet
description: A simple but profound 3D gimmick puzzle game.

name: Yamafuda! 2nd station
description: This is a game of hiking using cards. You choose a card for each station. If you make gears along the way, you can hike more comfortably. Let's enjoy many mountains!

name: Cosmosapiens
description: Cosmosapiens - Explore a galaxy. Discover strange new worlds with unexpected events and expand the of your reach Interact with diverse alien races. Fight and trade...

name: Behind Closed Doors: A Developer's Tale
description: In Behind Closed Doors, you plays as Ethan, who works for a small indie company, trying to support his pregnant wife. He gets an unexpected phone call during the middle of the night, and is teleports to another dimension, where he has to face a series of challenges to get back to the real world.

name: Soulstopia: Phi
description: Restless spirits robbed of their dreams and ambitions arrive in Soulstopia; a realm where a lonesome maiden awaits to deliver them salvation — Set the ill-fated free in style using various attacks and transform into a Demon when backed into a corner!

name: Flappy Person
description: Ever wondered how it is to be like a flappy person? Well now you can become one.

name: Funny puzzle
description: Funny puzzle game is an electronic form of classic puzzles, now you can collect puzzles on your computer! puzzles is not only a game of the mind, where you need logic, intelligence and ingenuity, but also a great way to calm your nerves.

name: Go Home, Mr. Fisk!
description: Go Home, Mr. Fisk! is a challenging (im)precision platformer, where a single mistake may bring you all the way back to the beginning. Mr. Fisk must make his way up a mountain to get back home to his lake, but climbing is a challenge for a salmon not used to moving on dry land.

name: Lowsy
description: Lowsy - a game whose main goal is to complete the level in such a way that each eyelid gets an eye. The eye has several parameters: color, speed, temperature, height, and you can change them with the help of objects.

name: Crom: Journey of Conquest
description: Crom: Journey of conquest is a real time strategy and adventure game build in a single package. It has a story, monsters, items, challenges, crafting, a unit editor and a large adventure map to play on.

name: Nightmare: The Origins
description: A horror and exploration game, investigate to find out the truth about your presence in these places. You are alone now and no one will hear you scream. Explore, find clues and escape your group must try to successfully discover the source of the evil

name: Memories of Loneliness
description: Memories Of Loneliness is a short story of psychological horror, where you have to find out what happened.

name: League Space
description: The space league has started! It's time to prove yourself and bring victory to your team. Decide who you want to be on your team and win the war against aliens from other galaxies to stop the invasion in your world to end.

name: How to Bathe Your Cat
description: It is well known that cats aren' t really fond of water, but, as pet owners, we know that sometimes a good bath is welcome. Use bombs and blocks to channel the water and clean your cat!

name: TitTok 2
description: TitTok - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws! Continuation of the first part.

name: Sola
description: Sola is a 3rd Person 3D Runner-Platformer with Exploration elements. Can you manage to escape into another world, or will you keep repeating the same dream over and over again?

name: Rectitude
description: Rectitude, is a Sci-Fi visual novel that centers around Timothy, a renowned professor who creates a groundbreaking technology.

name: Midinous
description: Midinous is a grid-based non-linear MIDI sequencer usable with any Digital Audio Workstation or hardware that accepts MIDI messages. Midinous can also generate its own simple sounds either for reference, or for normal use.

name: I'm a cowboy: Western Shooter
description: A hardcore top-down shooter set in the wild west. [/]Each shootout can be the last. You need a great reaction to defeat your enemies.

name: Never End, Neverland!
description: “Never End, Neverland!” is a 2D story-based adventure game, focused on dialogue and unique puzzle gameplay. Follow Amber, an 11-year old girl who wakes up one day in Neverland: a magical, dream-like place where your outer appearance is reflective of your own self-opinions.

name: Procedural Soccer
description: Work your way up from an unknown, low-league team up to the Championship league, or just play a quick game against another team. Explore your world, play different teams and find your favorite!

name: Golf For Fun in Ice
description: Golf for fun ice, is a 2D game based on golf, bringing players a hundred elaborate stages to test their skills.

name: Polyslime
description: An action survival game where you will craft weapons to survive waves of slime monsters.

name: Eyes of the Night
description: Eyes of the Night is a fast-paced, creepy game about finding treasure in a forest during the dark of night, while avoiding the deadly wolves who hunt you! Once you master the hard difficulty, can you survive the hardcore "deathrun" mode?

name: Hero or Foe
description: Hero or Foe could be a fast-paced online multiplayer Hide-and-Seek to fulfill your Hero/Kaijin (wannabe) fantasies with your friends!

name: Once Upon a Time in the Colony
description: 《殖民地往事》是一款生存模拟游戏，前往平行世界的新大陆。在条件恶劣的大陆上生存发展，耕种作物，书写自己的殖民地故事。

name: Close Quarters Supremacy: The Legis
description: A sci-fi third person action shooter, Close Quarters Supremacy The Legis, is a journey into the power struggle over advanced A.I.

name: 4 Witch Seasons & Convenant
description: 刚刚从孤儿院离开的少年遇到了自己亲生父亲的女儿，被要求前往她所在的城市的大学。少年进入了探索都市传说的社团，当在快乐的探索世界的大学生活之中度过的时候，城市之中释放出的吞噬一切的怪物出现在了他的面前，如同神明一样的神秘少女拯救。

name: String Rush
description: String Rush is a puzzle-platformer where you don't control your avatar in real time, but you have to enter the movement commands (input) inside a string and execute them all together.

name: Outergalactic Aliens Pinball
description: Outergalactic Aliens Pinball is a fast paced 8 flipper pinball game featuring 8 main missions, for more info check out our complete walkthrough guide! Get ready to battle the galaxy while listening to a twelve minute original soundtrack to keep the action rolling.

name: Higgs Boson: Timed Puzzle
description: Higgs Boson: Timed Puzzle is a minimalist and challenging puzzle game where the player must rotate pieces considering the time limit to assemble a particle accelerator.

name: Ballin'
description: Play as a ball, rolling, bouncing and flying your ball through the levels and try to beat each one as fast as you can!

name: Colours and Symbols
description: Colours and symbols is a single-player puzzle-solving game. Slide the coloured symbols around and match the sequence provided.

name: Planet Hotpot
description: Planet Hotpot is a VR shooter where you run around shooting aliens as an employee of a galactic megacorporation to recover corporate espionage left all over the world by your bungling coworker.

name: Lake Road
description: Lake Road is a simple addicting hyper-casual game that anyone can play.

name: Toadomination
description: Toadomination is a rogulite, bullethell, looter shooter game that takes you into an ancient confrontation that lasts more than a decade, in a battle between a toad and a viper. Equip yourself with the most powerful weapon, collect capital and meet face to face with the sworn enemy.

name: Cade Prime
description: Cade Prime is the DoD's most advanced android. Bad Dudes have placed him inside of the Mainframe. Can You help him solve challenging puzzles in order to escape ?

name: Astrd
description: ASTRD is an arcade roguelike shooter where you build & upgrade your ship that automatically attacks asteroids and enemies. Combine different blocks to unlock class bonuses and create endless unique configurations, to face endless waves of varied enemies in this 3D bullet-hell game.

name: Jericho's Rose
description: Help the little ghost Jericho explore an ancient temple in the middle of the desert, so it can bring a rare flower to its grandma. Find a variety of magical trinkets and unexpected companions to help you solve the mysteries of the temple's maze-like corridors.

name: Unawake
description: Unawakens is a melee first person action adventure game in a surreal realm which combines ancient history and fantasy together. Live your journey beyond the battlefields of the Fallen Angels and the giant Unawakens. The Eternal War continues!

name: Calluna
description: Calluna is a small adventure game about the Norwegian composer and violinist Ole Bull. In Calluna, you can play as Ole Bull in four independent adventures as young, old, rich, and poor. Walk the streets of Bergen, Paris, and Cairo in first-person and explore a semi-open world filled with interactive items, townspeople, and collectibles. Solve quests based on historical events and follow Ole Bull’s dream of fame and glory.

name: Spirit Overflow
description: Spirit Overflow is the first online multiplayer e-sport for indoor cycling! Every game is an intense 3v3 territory battle that calls for skills, strategies, and sweat.

name: She Will Shoot
description: She Will Shoot - is a cool zombie killer from the third person in a variety of scenery. Choose an arena and use different types of weapons to clear it of zombies.

name: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
description: Lead troops in tense tactical battles, just you and your brain against the dying world. Manage a mercenary company, scavenge supplies, build an army. Go on a quest! Burn down a village or two... Inspired by Warhammer, FTL and Total War.

name: Gomoku Let's Go
description: Gomoku: One of the most popular classic board games for all ages. Experience Zen style visuals, various levels of AI, seamless online multiplayer and Endgame challenges!

name: Pipeline VR
description: Pipeline VR is a hectic virtual reality puzzle game, that pits you against a rising tide of torrential water. With the residents of Pipesville in desperate need for plumbers, can YOU solve their plumbing emergencies?

name: History Table: Lore & Quiz
description: Take a trip through time and learn more about the main events and people of world history with the History Table: Lore & Quiz!

name: Anti Frank's Wrath
description: Anti Frank is unleashing his wrath on the universe! Play by yourself or with a few friends locally to take down hoards of zombies and stop Anti Frank! Play as one of four unique characters and buy new upgrades and weapons as you rid the universe of zombies.

name: BuriBoard
description: Join the ride and help us make BuriBoard a renowned fingerboarding simulator by purchasing the early access today!

name: The Last War
description: The Last War is an online multiplayer shooter where are you try to kill the opposite team with your friends, after you kill so many call And a kill streak and see what happens, customize your weapons and play a lot game modes.

name: Kick Bastards
description: Kick Bastards is a fast paced parkour game with a deep movement system! Kick your way through beautiful and varied levels where you must find your own route to overcome challenges and get a sick time.

name: Furtive
description: Prisoners of war, your team was captured but on the run on a large military controlled island. Explore, gather resources, build a shelter and survive the dangerous military presence on the look out for your team in this epic first person, multiplayer, open world, survival adventure.

name: Stellar War
description: Sin descripción

name: Fleshport
description: In this horror-adventure game, you play as a child lost in a dystopian parallel dimension where human flesh is a commodity and outsiders are on the menu. You must flee from, hide from, and misdirect various threats as you search for a portal that will bring you back home.

name: Amazing Chicken Adventures
description: Embark on an adventure where gravity is your worst enemy & save the world one egg at a time! Featuring chicken-inappropriate tools and mandatory funny hats. Local split-screen co-op, 3D physics, explorable game world, puzzles, loot to collect. Oh, and a chainsaw.

name: Hackshot
description:
Hackshot is a twisted and extremely deep puzzle take on artillery games.
You are a hacker with the ability to craft unique projectiles, by mixing and matching different abilities. Use your imagination to hack in creative ways, and become a master hacker.

The game contains over 20 hours of shooting viruses and crashing the security, optional content and game modes, open-ended levels, over 7000 unique Cyberballs to craft. In addition, hackers will hack you back and there are no filler levels or condescending tutorials. Just pure challenging fun!

name: Deluge: Threnody of Crashing Waves
description: In the not so distant past, the Isle of Abbot underwent a mysterious evacuation event. Delve into the secrets of this unsettling place and elicit the girls' tragic fate. An interactive visual novel with psychological and lovecraftian undertones.

name: Bubble People
description: Bubble People is a point-and-click game, click on things with your mouse and have some fun!

name: Space Endeavor
description: Space Endeavor is an Action Shooter Game.

name: Defend the Fort
description: 2D topdown zombie survival shooter, build defences, survive the waves of zombies

name: Searching for objects in the forest
description: Searching for objects in the forest is a classic game in the genre of "I'm looking for". During the game, you will have to get acquainted and search various places.

name: Dice vs Dice
description: Roll, Roll, Roll. This is all you have and all you can. Fight the High Lord and his armies with your dice. Believe the luck you have or calculate the chances.

name: Warriors & Mages
description: You Play as the main character and travel to different villages and complete different quests while trying to save the king.

name: The Age of Gods Return
description: Behind the people and law of elementary physics,there are transcendental law instigator protect this world and pointer space which store the souls of everyone.

name: The Judgement of Q
description: In an alternate reality, using a keyboard and a mouse, despite the danger of dissolving to nothing again, the player chose to transform potential into actuality, in a space of possibility he will try every key and every combination of keys until he forms an ultimate map of this new reality.

name: The Ghost Cage
description: In this short and light-hearted adventure game, you inadvertently rent a house with a ghost. Should you befriend the ghost, or drive it out of the house? Multiple endings available depending on your choices and the items you find!

name: Mandeshire
description: Mandeshire is an RPG game about the struggles of our hero Mandeshire, who wants to save the tribes of the north from the servants of Erlik Khan. This game is inspired by features, events, and characters from Turkish Mythology, Mandeshire and Erlik Khan.

name: Gladiator of sparta
description: A classic addictive/fun indie mini game for windows that you will play every time!. Do you ever wonder what is like to be in a realistic combat arena and how it feel? Play as Octavius , the greek warrior who is forced to fight in the gladiatorial arenas with many of the best soldiers in the empire..

name: Dkls
description: In DKLS you can be a person, but you can also be a car, a cactus, a microbe, a penguin or even a pencil. Feel the experience of dissociating from your own reality.

name: Triple Take
description: Triple Take is a fast 2D precision platformer where the stage evolves as you complete it! Run, wall jump, climb and swim through increasing difficult levels in vibrant colored worlds!

name: Project Scav
description: Naki is a hardcore singleplayer 1st/3rd person shooter with parkour mechanics. Post-Apocalypse, stylized, scavenging, realistic weapons, crafting, character customization, weapon customization.

name: Legend of Labot: The Golden Pearl
description: An action-packed adventure through a breathtaking island of Moran where cute little creatures and powerful monsters live alongside humans. Slay monsters and bosses, collect pearls, unlock powerful abilities and ultimately seek the elusive golden pearl.

name: Nanocorp
description: Fight back against the Nanocorp corporation in this cyberpunk RTS. As you discover their evil machinations, you decide to take a stand for humanity. Forget about saving the world, can you even save yourself?

name: Unsafe Express
description: Unsafe Express is a cooperative first-person survival horror game for 1-4 players. Navigate through space stations, collect materials and outlast your enemies! Choose your objective based on complexity levels, then cast your vote. Gather items, exterminate hostiles, fulfill missions and repeat!

name: They Are Coming!
description: They Are Coming! is a zombie action game. Control, upgrade and grow your zombie horde. Defeat all humans through past, present, and future and make the zombie apocalypse happen!

name: Wide Open
description: 'Wide Open' was born out of a love for old-school, top-down racing games. We've done our part to make it fresh and set it apart from the rest. With a fully deformable terrain, you can be sure that no lap will be like the last. There are many terrain types like asphalt, dirt, sand, mud, and more!

name: Far Sector
description: All that matters is that you're a spaceship captain. Your objective is to explore the far sector. Build, develop, and research. Get to the bottom of the targets of your mission and find out the truth of what happened before it.

name: Ghost Terminator
description: Let's vanish some ghosts! Explore, shoot, run, throw grenades, have some fun and get a little scared. Your mission is to find and annihilate all the ghosts.

name: Am I the baddie?
description: Fetch some friends for fun, fast online multiplayer. One of you is the baddie! Everybody else is trying to find the baddie. The baddie is invisible. At least, most of the time...

name: Queen of Zarkov
description: 'Queen of Zarkov' is an 'indie-3rd-person-shooter' that combines elements of 'Escape from Tarkov' with zombies. Embark on missions and loot everything you can, while surviving against different types of zombies and other deadly threats. All your Equipment will be lost if you die, so try to survive!

name: Dragon Trails
description: Create a party of four adventurers and set forth down the Dragon Trails to defeat the vicious dragons wreaking havoc across the land! When you fail, create a new party, find your failed attempts, and loot their items so you can go farther down the trails!

name: Poly Racing
description: Poly Racing is a low poly casual racing game that for some reason is really fun to drift in. Pick and paint whatever car you like, and just have fun drifting and jumping around. And Poly Racing, early access or not, is going to be a community driven game.

name: Bravest Burden
description: You must protect the last light in a world of darkness. Bravest Burden is a cooperative, multiplayer RPG. In order to survive this brutal world, you will need to look out for each other during your treacherous adventures.

name: Alchemist's Mountain
description: Alchemist's Mountain is a dungeon solving, adventure platformer rendered in hi-bit pixel art. It tells a heartwarming story of courage and endearing characters, looking to find their place in a world of magic and science.

name: Against Ether
description: A fantasy RPG with music based fights where you will help a young girl to change the fate of the world!

name: Endocrisis Hyperactive
description: Endocrisis Hyperactive the next top-down shoot em up with intense action. Absorb bullets to increment your power and get new weapons. Pass through levels with a lot of enemies and bullets and, of course, intense boss battles

name: Void of Space
description: Void of Space is an RPG, horror-survival game, a science fiction adventure. Explore the colonizer ship Genesis IV, abandoned in the atmosphere of an unknown alien planet. Craft items, find weapons and equipment to defend against the hostile life forms you encounter.

name: Crusade of Deitra
description: RPG 2D, Single Player

name: Running Water
description: You are a "Runner" known as subject #0076101, created out of water by a tyrannical A.I. that runs the facility. During testing an error occurs and you are released unexpectedly into the basement where you must run, jump, climb and fight for your freedom using the tools found along the way.

name: Clash of the Metal
description: Hyper Mecha Anime Manga Fighting Unleashed! Clash of the Metal introduces the mecha combat league in a glorious 2D anime styled arcade action fighting game..

name: Beneath the Mountain
description: In Beneath the Mountain, you play as the King of a new Dwarven civilization seeking to find their fortune beneath the mountain. You dig your way through the mountain, encountering many dangerous foes along the way, all while defending your kingdom from periodic Orc invasions.

name: Umbra: Journey Home
description: Umbra: Journey Home is a single-player, 3D puzzle game. Entering lights will cause you to lose control. Create shadows by moving objects in your environment to pass through. Adventure through a mysterious world to discover answers.

name: Noble's Life: Kingdom Reborn
description: Mix of realistic medieval noble simulator with a strategy game of historical depth. Manage your city and villages and make decisions in non-linear events. Command defenses in epic sieges and organize dangerous raids.

name: Force Reboot
description: Force Reboot is a fast-paced nonstop FPS with rogue-lite elements. Force Reboot is entirely focused on nonstop gameplay. You need to get past all of the rooms as fast as you can.

name: Traffic Chase
description: Road racing game. Beep at any traffic driver to start the race! Connect more drivers at any time! Earn money on road races, tune or buy a new car, participate in more racing events. Keep on racing!

name: Cat Capacity
description: A crazy cat lady simulator.

name: Midnight Blues
description: Smash, slash, and shoot your way to freedom through the bloody criminal underworld of a dark, future New York. Midnight Blues features fast-paced, unforgiving combat that will tug at your nerves until every man but you is dead.

name: Facteroids
description: Facteroids is a 3D factory building game about asteroid mining in space. Prospect, mine and manage your production lines in a variety of scenarios and procedurally generated worlds across the entire Solar system.

name: Seed of Agony
description: Grow an army of demons aboard the living ship, the Seed of Agony, and use them to conquer an infinite, procedurally generated galaxy, in this new take on the 4x genre.

name: Lost Twins 2
description: Lost Twins 2 is an incredibly cute puzzle adventure that will challenge, entertain and maybe even inspire you. Guide Abi and Ben on their journey to find a way back home across a whimsical playground crafted with an enormous amount of care.

name: Delicious Fruitworld
description: Delicious Fruitworld is a classic jump 'n' run platformer where the goal is to complete each level with as many points as possible.Points are awarded for fruits distributed in the world and for a good time in which the level was passed. Share your score!

name: Code of the Savage
description: Inspired by the classics from the 80s and 90s - Code of the Savage is a western RPG with a heavy emphasis on exploration and NPC interaction. It features a large, seamless open world to explore. There is a focus on player freedom and the consequences that go along with that.

name: Dinogotchi
description: Dinogotchi is a tamagotchi-like game featuring cute dinosaurs. Take care, evolve, have fun and give lots of love to your little jurassic friends!

name: Below the Ocean
description: Dive deep "Below the Ocean" in search of legendary treasures while using your oxygen lifeline to swing passed obstacles! Run, Jump, Swing, Bubble-Jump, Bungee, Slingshot, Puzzle-Solve, Platform, Treasure-Hunt, BELOW THE OCEAN!

name: Tower to Heaven
description: Tower To Heaven is a simple, fun and pretty JRPG. Climb the tower, relax and battle bad guys and reap the reward.

name: Valor
description: Embark on a epic journey through a range of different environments and arenas. Upgrade, personalize and finetune your characters, overcome different challenges and bossfights to prove the single most important thing: your worth as a gladiator.

name: Fira
description: A lovely and emotional 3rd-person puzzle game centered on Kara: a young woman who deals with a painful past experience. Armed with her elemental skill, help her try to find her way accross a mysterious land and put an end to this pain.

name: SwapOut
description: A roguelike FPS game, focusing on gun customization and fast gameplay. Survive the zombie apocalypse, and possibly end it.

name: Necromancer's Gift
description: Necromancer's Gift is a Monster tamer sprinkled with roguelike elements like permadeath and procedurally-generated maps. Capture and face creatures in turn-based battles as you attempt to rescue your dog from a Necromancer that hates humans.

name: Heart & Soul
description: A romance otome visual novel set in Ancient Greece that follows the myth of Psyche as she falls in love with her mysterious husband. Navigate fickle gods and Psyche's looming tragic fate by making meaningful choices that affect the story and its ending.

name: Shinorubi
description: Shinorubi is a Bullet Hell Shoot'em up in the tradition of Danmaku games. A pure dose of adrenaline and frenetic arcade action. Choose your pilot and a spaceship, face powerful Bosses, and experience many cool Arrange Mods!

name: Turing Complete
description: In this challenging puzzle game, you build a computer from scratch and program it. It is a journey through the layers of abstractions of the computer. The game begins when you are abducted by aliens who are testing your intelligence, and from here a lighthearted sci-fi plot evolves.

name: Dance like a butterfly, Shot like a Bee!
description: The steampunk and biological indie game!

name: Starship
description: Destroy your enemies, dodge asteroids, upgrade your ship and improve your skill in this 2D rogue space shooter !

name: Room 13
description: You have just checked in to your motel room, 'Room 13'...unlucky you. A sudden knock on your room door, awakens you from your deep sleep and turns out to become your unluckiest nightmare.

name: Gênese
description: An interactive experience of creating entire stellar systems, planets and civilizations, playing as the supreme God of this Universe. Build colossal worlds from molecules. Evolve advanced civilizations from simple bacteria. Experience an amazing, rich and detailed gameplay, writing your own story.

name: Ninja: Rise of a Hero
description: The path of the ninja is hard! Can you save your beloved and become a hero?

name: The Madhouse: Kansen Yashiki
description: The Madhouse | Kansen Yashiki is a survival horror game. Contains Fear, Stealth, Exploration/Puzzle solving, Item management. Moreover "Multiple first-person views" provides a new level of fear, immersion, strategy. Steal the vision of "something" lurking in the abandoned house and try to survive.

name: Orph: The Lost Boy
description: Orph - The Lost Boy is a first-person horror game where you have to find out what happened with your son. Explore an old orphanage, uncover secrets long forgotten, solve puzzles and don't forget to watch your back.

name: Soul Dream: Undesired Shift
description: Evan and Aviary have been cast into the Undesired Reality, where unknown forces prevent them from returning to their reality. Confronted by two mysterious figures and assailed by monsters, Evan and Aviary must fight and determine the truth of the Undesired Reality

name: Recall: Empty wishes
description: Recall: Empty wishes is a story-driven game based in Taiwan. The story centers around the desires and memories shared by a brother-sister pair.

name: World Of Stalkers
description: World Of Stalkers is an exciting online first-person shooter, Stalker-style, in which you have to fight the strongest Stalkers of Cordona. An unforgettable multiplayer experience awaits you in the Exclusion Zone, where not only skill and accuracy, but also the ability to play as a team, decides.

name: Holiday Cheer 3
description: Explore a Christmas decorated Victorian house with 100 levels of match 3 game play for hours of relaxing entertainment in this atmosphere filled Christmas themed Match 3 game. Escape into this puzzling winter wonderland this christmas.

name: Alpha One
description: Alpha One is a turn based strategy game with real time encounters. Each action level is a turn in a strategic conflict to survive or defeat your opponent. Race to collect resources, acquire upgrades, expand territory and economy, build defenses, all to defeat the enemy or escape home.

name: Caves Of Mars
description: Caves of Mars is a new 2D sci-fi action adventure space shooter game set in the mysterious caves of the planet Mars. Your mission is to navigate your spacecraft through 100 procedurally generated levels, battle against and destroy enemies and alien lifeforms and collect as many gems as possible.

name: Timescape: Altitude
description: The pilots are gone, You are locked to a seat, and have been left to die on a plane. Best to get out, as quickly as possible. Solve a series of puzzles to escape and jump to safety. You will need all your wits on this mission.

name: Randy and Teddy Adventure Road
description: A puzzle 2.5D platformer where Randy, main character, and Teddy, his pup go on an amazing adventure road! Go with them and travel to 5 different worlds where you'll meet pesky robots that will make this journey hard. Solve challenging puzzles and earn stars and achievements as you go!

name: Eternal Evil
description: A small town is being taken over by ghouls. Solve puzzles, carefully read notes and use various weapons against horrific and evolving enemies to uncover what is behind this gruesome event. Eternal Evil is an old-school survival-horror game.

name: Core Alpha
description: Core Alpha is an arcade first-person shooter, which is made in the best traditions of old-school shooters. Fight and defeat hordes of zombies, as well as destroy infected cores to fight the main enemy.

name: SideTracked!
description: An online co-op and pvp adventure action RPG focused around community, socializing, and adventure. In a world infested with a mysterious fog, turn yourself into a hero!

name: World Order
description: World order is revolutionary sci-fi real-time strategy, the main feature of which are modular units

name: Yacht Dice
description: Yacht Dice is a classic dice game popular around the world, each player by throwing dice statistics score to carry on the game, the player with the highest score wins. Invite friends to play online, or compete against players from around the world.

name: 100 Hidden Birds 2
description: Hidden object game in the cartoon city style. Animation and puzzles. Very large location. Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

name: Rd Mars
description: RD Mars is a top-down shooter where you play as an AI reconstruction of a once-great inventor, Felix Darwins. Explore the laboratory, and learn of his rise and downfall.

name: Puzzle Art: Cats
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with cats.

name: Grid Slayer
description: A unique tactical grid based card game with roguelite elements. Use elemental wizardry to manipulate your environment and defeat overwhelming odds. Test your wits and resolve to rise above the chaos.

name: Smashing time
description: VR destruction simulation, destroy everything in the museum, the oval office, a restaurant or a simple flat ! Wreak havoc and let the devil out !

name: Witches vs. Demons
description: Witches Vs. Demons is a Rage Dungeon Crawler based around using SteamVR to build an immersive gameplay experience. The first edition of Witches Vs. Demons will have 10 playable levels, unique boss encounters with raid mechanics for single players, & scaling difficulty into multiplayer content.

name: Twelve Floors Below.
description: A claustrophobic horror game taking place in an elevator.

name: Professor of Magical Studies
description: Professor of Magical Studies is an interactive magical school novel by Stephen Granade, where your choices control the story. It’s entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Magical Inspector Momo
description: Magical inspector Momo uncovers the dirty secrets of adults! She must infiltrate without being discovered by anyone and without being caught in a trap!

name: Chess
description: "Chess" is a turn based combat game.

name: Iris Covenant: Song of the Forgotten Heroes
description: Old School RPG.You accepted a request to save the world from a religious group called Levin Relief Society. Ancient mysteries and unknown dangers are waiting for you ahead the journey.

name: Dungescape!
description: Dungescape! is a casual, minimalist escape-room game in which players control Celeste, a young noblewoman who has been trapped in a series of mazes of ever-increasing size and complexity. More than 40 rooms await to challenge adventurers in this humble kickoff for solo-dev Autism Fanaticism Gaming!

name: Oh, Dungeon Master
description: Oh, Dungeon Master is a dungeon simulator, with elements of a roguelike game. Explore the intricate underground mazes and dense forests to exterminate monsters and find all the pictures!

name: My Inner Darkness is a Hot Anime Girl!
description: My Inner Darkness Is A Hot Anime Girl! is a 3D turn-based RPG game featuring surreal enemy designs and dream-like locations, packed into a gripping story about overcoming the thoughts and memories you would rather not have but can't stop thinking about. You know, the ones that keep you up at night.

name: Pussy 4
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Andarilho: Aliens
description: Survive among aliens!

name: Smelted Kin
description: Science fiction 2D shooter with platformer and metroidvania elements. Players will have to explore a huge research complex consisting of nonlinear levels, which is crowded with robots

name: LineVox 2: Forward to the Past
description: LineVox 2: Forward to the Past - a casual cyberpunk game suitable for both one player and several players with the ability to play on one computer, over a local network or online.

name: Habitat
description: The corporate space race begins! An Adventure/Survival/Farming game where you need to manage resources while exploring the planet and interacting with ancient alien artifacts in order to change the climate, survive the seasonal elements, evade enemies and stack up on Doge to conquer a new world

name: Tentacles of Submission
description: Horny kraken with lustful tentacles versus anime girls!

name: Street Legal: Revision
description: Take the STREET ACTION to the next level, in this loving re-release of the 2002 bargain-bin classic! Featuring over 1000 unique swappable parts, 16 detailed vehicles to tune, race, destroy and maintain, a large city to unlock, and much more, now with plenty of fixes and improvements!

name: HaunTD
description: The game of haunted contraptions.

name: Thru
description: A thru-hiking roguelite adventure

name: Cubicus 2
description: Continuation of the first part of the puzzle in which you will find even more levels of varying difficulty.

name: Tactics of World War I
description: Tactics of World War I is a real time tactics (RTT) game that puts you in the role of a military leader in the First World War. It requires you to plan your actions thoroughly and make smart tactical decisions in the blink of an eye.

name: Mr.King Luo! Don't Be Kidding: Chapter 2
description: Chapter 2 is a free DLC that includes all new chapters and stages. It also has a new Boss Rush Mode and includes a digital artbook.

name: Dirty Wars: September 11
description: Dive into the clandestine life of resistance against Pinochet's military regime where people are captured, tortured and murdered on a daily basis. Solve challenging puzzles and explore Santiago without getting caught in this sinister part its history.

name: Gravity Square
description: Part-time work urgently needed! Beginners welcome! Manipulate the gravity of the planet Square and earn your wages by collecting the many aliens that spring up! Compete for income with other part time worker from around the world!

Coop sci-fi battleroyale action offline/online multiplayer game. It's 2300 AC, Beings from planet Venus are back and they declare WAR to humans with zombies. Play Singleplayer or Multiplayer, military weapons with autocombust ammo, make body parts fly, clear the area from deadly hordes, Just action!

name: Get in the Car, Loser!: Battle on the Big Boardwalk
description: Take a break from adventure and relax on the beach in BATTLE ON THE BIG BOARDWALK — an all new story chapter featuring 15 new endgame items, an all new sword to rival the Sword of Fate, our hardest boss yet, and most importantly... beach outfits for everyone you can use at any time.

name: Blues and Bullets: Episode 2
description: Blues and Bullets is a dark and violent crime thriller. Set in an alternative Eliot Ness & Al Capone story, Blues and Bullets blends a stunning script with detective work to deliver an amazing interactive experience.

name: Daggan
description: A sexy furry game where you reproduce to make big armies and build cities.

name: Tunguska: A Call in the Woods
description: Make your way through dense Siberian woods in search of a missing person in this path-finding survival adventure. Compass and map included.

name: Crossing Guard Joe
description: In Monoxide City where the cars don't stop, only one man can help kids cross the street.

name: Night Hunter
description: A unique, one of a kind hunting experience. Call and hunt predators, earn money and upgrade to better equipment. Are you the next Night Hunter?

name: Echo: An Indie Tale
description: You are fragile and the world is dangerous. Explore with care and courage. Solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, in search of something. An outlet? An answer? A hope? A doubt?

name: VR Fitness Gym
description: VR Immersive Fitness Gym: 6 New VR Exercises You Never Experienced. Bored with exercise? Virtual reality, immersive fitness might help you.

name: SF2K: Class Dismissed
description: Delve into social gameplay like no other, playing with tenuous alliances and bitter rivalries on the harshest battlefield know to humans - the schoolyard playground. Who can you REALLY trust?

name: Semester Begins! Xiaomi
description: "The Chinese 80s" is a game that simulates the daily life and learning of Chinese post-80s pupils. Take you to experience China in the 1980s and show the living environment and state of learning, culture and entertainment in the 1980s.

name: Covid-19 (Corona Virus)
description: Do you have what it takes to perform everyday tasks and curve balls life gives you to survive this quarantine? If you do you will get out this quarantine successfully and life will go back to normal.

name: A Sinful Camp
description: "Please protect me... Please get me out of here..." Spike was taken to a concentration camp where he met Anna, the goddess he had loved for years, only to find out she was being abused every night in the cell next to his. Spike, who had been peeping at everything in anger and pity, became obsessed with this painful desire.

name: One Pixel TWB
description: 2D platform game with minimalist pixel art graphics, create platforms and shoot a lot to defeat several bosses that have invaded your castle and are trying to destroy your city.

name: Namaiki Dark Elf Sisters
description: The half-human, half-elf Ober grew up discriminated against by his own family due to his mixed heritage, but one day a prophecy flips that life upside down. Now declared as the future head of his family, the sisters that once mistreated him are ordered to serve him and bear his children.

name: The Prisoner of the Night
description: The Prisoner of the Night is a single-player platforming game with a wide range of scenarios, where the lovely girl Nartide must survive terrible monsters and deadly traps in the darkest, scariest night of her life.

name: Protect Sea War
description:
Battle of the Sea is an RTS real-time battle of the sea game - a real battle on your computer!

The game can be free to operate large cruisers, medium-sized cruisers, mine boats, torpedo boats, submarines, aircraft, tanks, soldiers.
Use strategy to defeat the enemy and defend the country's territorial waters.

name: UFO Checkers
