description: A classic game of checkers to play with your friends. Turn-based and themed after an alien invasion.

name: Animal Cafe
description: Luna has been working too hard, fortunately as she finishes up each night she manages to find her way to a hidden out of the way cafe, one where the gals all dress up like different animals. It could be a place for dreams to come true, or just for Luna to blow off some steam and relax each night.

name: Cuckoo Curling
description: Curling with the rules of connect four! A fun, healthy and relaxing hobby for everyone. Just watch out for the crocodile.

name: Gardenia
description:
A contemplative world-building game / toy. Take your time and tweak this or that little world.

The game is available in English and Brazilian Portuguese.

name: Castlevania: Rondo of Ruin
description: Castlevania Rondo of Ruin is a Castlevania Portrait of Ruin romhack aiming to modify most of the games content. There is a new story, new items, sprites, weapons, music, and most of the games areas are modified in both small and big ways. Set 5 years after the events of Symphony of the Night, join Richter Belmont, Maria Renard and their companions as they work to unravel what has caused Castlevania’s early return to the world of humans.

name: Indigo Child
description: Play as the mystical Indigo Child and save some souls while wandering through the forest. The game is designed to work with both keyboard and 360 controller. It is a gamejam style experience.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Dissonance - A Juste Story Mode Hack
description: Castlevania Dawn of Dissonance is a Castlevania Dawn of Sorrow romhack aiming to modify most of the games content. There is a new story, new items, sprites, weapons, music, and most of the castle was modified in both small and big ways. Set 8 years after his last adventure, join Juste Belmont and his companions as they work to unravel the plot of the Bartley family.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow No Required Touch Screen
description: This patch makes several changes to Dawn of Sorrow so that you can complete the game without needing to use the touch screen for anything.

name: Sheep's Quest
description: You`ll love this stimulating Brain Teaser in which you guide a herd of sheep through seven game worlds in an effort to collect enough coins to rebuild their once magnificent farm. Steering the adorable animals around enemies and obstacles to the riches they need is as simple as placing arrows on the ground pointing the way. Featuring colorful graphics and delightful audio, Sheep`s Quest is sure to become one of your favorites!

name: Scarred Stars: Traumatic Edition
description: Enter amusement park from hell and escape with your sanity - if you can! Adventure through a ruined amusement park with a dark past. Escape monsters and discover multiple endings in this survival horror game!

name: Gex the Gecko in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: This is a mod which changes Sonic to Gex the Gecko, with gameplay from its first game, including wall climbing.

name: Annihilation Mobile
description: Sin descripción

name: Kung Fu Pets
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragonicle
description: Dragonicle is a MMORPG mobile game by X-legend.

name: Deep of the Ocean
description: Sin descripción

name: Hero Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Noah's Heart
description: Immerse yourself in intense battles with enemies from evil factions. Explore uniquely designed dungeons. Choose and build weapons and skills that best suit your style of play. Noah’s Heart is a next-generation MMORPG. Explore the planet Noah and uncover its secrets with your friends! Adventure and fortune await you, explorers!

name: Soul of Phantasm
description: Sin descripción

name: Honya Monogatari
description: Honya Monogatari is a bookstore management sim by Kairosoft.

name: Balloon De Fight'2000
description: Sin descripción

name: Balloon De Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Emanate
description: Emanate is a single-level, vertical world filled with jumping patterns made up of various platforming mechanics. The most common of which are the orange/red bounce pads, purple wall-jump pads, and the fading platforms, that vanish from under your feet after a very short amount of time. Combining these simple mechanics urges you to keep moving forward, making for some incredibly challenging and intense platforming gameplay.

name: Lifespan
description: A surrealistic pastiche of five episodes leading the player through events representative of the human experience from childhood to death.

name: Tropical America
description:
Tropical America is a game that fuses the new world of video games to a compelling past through a journey to unravel the mysteries of the Americas. Your journey begins as the sole survivor of a terrible massacre - you must find four pieces of evidence to bring justice to the memory of your small village.
Developed in collaboration with Los Angeles artists, teachers, writers and high school students, the game features a bilingual, thematic gameplay, accompanied by an online database of educational resource materials, source texts and imagery.

name: Alphabet
description: Originally available only to select Kickstarter backers, A͈L͈P͈H͈A͈B͈E͈T͈ is a slapstick marathon footrace for 1- to 26-players from Keita Takahashi and Adam Saltsman. Run, jump, eat, sing, poop, and sleep through silly obstacle courses!

name: Rat Chaos
description: Rat Chaos is a 2012 stream of consciousness art and browser game created by Winter Lake.

name: Exploit
description: Exploit is a strategic pseudohacking game about a US hacker. One day, he receives a message from his friend sk3tch who tells him about the island Locha, a dictatorship in the middle of the ocean that filters internet access through a firewall, a government-mandated censor designed to curtail any political dissent. Sk3tch urges the hacker to use his skills for good and compromise it to bring some freedom to the country.

name: Synth
description: Synth is a strategic action game, in which the player must find an exit in a procedurally generated landscape. The player is equipped with a laser, bombs, and a device that acts as a vacuum or blower. The overall goal is to reach the highest level possible.

name: Purrfect Tale
description: This story is told through interactive comics. You'll need to consider and make your choices to progress. What will you do when the cat you take in turns into a human? What kind of outfit will you wear for your spring outing...? Each interaction will give you a chance to better understand your cat-eared youth. Each time you try your best, you'll have a chance to get one step closer to your dream. Each action you take will impact the continuation of the story. So, what kind of choices will you make?

name: You and I and the Long, Long Drive
description: Idle talk between a pair of people on a road trip to Pluto.

name: Railroads Online
description: Build your dream railroad across a huge open world! You can build tracks and stations, drive detailed locomotives, and transport goods to earn money and experience. Play exciting Online Multiplayer sessions with your friends or create your very own Single-player sandbox!

name: Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story
description: Episode one of a four-part prequel. A story of magic, mayhem and fairies. A perfect game to get into the Halloween spirit. If you enjoy RPGs from the SNES period then this may be the game for you, as my big inspirations for the game were Lufia and Breath of Fire.

name: Choo-Choo Charles
description: Navigate an island in an old train, upgrade it over time, and use it to fight an evil sentient train that terrorizes your home. Charles is hungry; don't be his next meal.

name: Blade of Darkness
description: Blade of Darkness is a hardcore fantasy action-adventure with unique combat mechanics and role-playing elements that pioneered the “soulsborne” genre. Pick one of four characters to hack and slash through a gory quest to save the world from the forces of Chaos.

name: Touhou Monster TD
description: Easy to learn but hard to master, Touhou Monster TD is a unique Tower defense Game. Control your character, level up and unlock tower skills and character talents, use your wisdom to defeat incoming enemies. Travel the Gensokyo, find out why the "Incident" happened this time.

name: Dark Light
description: Dark Light is a single-player 3D puzzle game. Levels present physical obstacles that must be conquered by moving beams of light that create solid platforms, allowing the player to maneuverer themselves towards the exit.

name: Impulse
description: Picture a mash-up of Super Meat Boy and Lunar Lander. Or N+ meets Asteroids. That’s Impulse.

name: Fishing Frenzy
description: Fishing Frenzy is a very interesting fishing game! You have to fight for prey, catch fish, blow up mad sharks and seahorses, collect stellar fish and shells, catch bubbles and bombs, worms, treasures, watches and gifts.

name: Fuyu no Tsuma
description: Fuyu no Tsuma is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles
description: Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles – enjoy 120 puzzles made from colorful and breathtaking photos

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd: Call of Guru
description: The game is a free add-on for the base game. This game is made using the GAMEGURU, FPS engine. An ambitious work that challenges the limits of GAMEGURU.

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd: Family Doctor
description: Short adventure game with third person point of view. The game is a free add-on for the base game.

description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 041.
